price: Nami nitawapa muda. Hakika mpango wangu ni madhubuti.
footnotes: Nitawakunjulia maisha, bila ya kuyapuuza maovu yao. Na mipango yangu niliyo wapangia ni ya nguvu na mikali juu yao, inalingana na madhambi yao yaliyo zidi kwa kupita kiasi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
